All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AdminActivity
The AdminActivity class extends AppCompatActivity and serves as a control center for administrators within the application.
AdminActivityUITest
Tests for the AdminActivity UI, verifying the correct navigation actions from the admin dashboard to different sections of the app, including viewing events, profiles, and images.
AdminAttendeeDetailActivity
Activity for displaying and managing details of an event attendee within the admin context.
AdminAttendeeDetailActivityUITest
UI tests for the AdminAttendeeDetailActivity within the EventLink QR Pro app, focusing on the visibility and state of UI elements after certain actions, such as deletion operations.
AdminAttendeeList
An activity that displays a list of attendees to an admin.
Alert
Represents an alert message within the application.
AlertAdapter
An ArrayAdapter subclass for displaying Alert objects in a ListView or a similar view.
Attendee
Represents an attendee of an event, encapsulating details such as name, phone number, email, and location information.
AttendeeActivity
Activity for managing attendee-specific functionalities such as viewing events, editing profile, scanning QR codes, and viewing alerts.
AttendeeAlerts
An activity that displays a list of event-related alerts or messages for a specific attendee.
AttendeeList
An activity that displays lists of attendees who have checked in and individuals who have signed up for future events.
AttendeeTest
The AttendeeTest class conducts unit tests on the Attendee class, ensuring that all attendee attributes are correctly managed.
BrowseDeleteEventAdmin
An activity designed for administrators to browse through a list of events.
BrowseDeleteEventAdminDetail
Activity for displaying detailed information about an event to an admin user, with options to cancel or delete the event.
BrowseEventsActivity
An activity that allows attendees to browse through a list of events.
BrowseEventsActivityTest
UI tests for the BrowseEventsActivity of the EventLink QR Pro app.
CreateEventDialogFragment
A DialogFragment that presents a form to the user for creating a new event.
EditProfileActivity
An activity that allows users to edit and update their profile information, including their name, email, phone number, and profile picture.
Event
Represents an event with details such as name, date, time, location, and description.
EventDetailActivity
Displays the details of a specific event and provides functionalities like viewing and editing event details, registering for QR codes, viewing attendees, sending notifications, and displaying the event location on a map.
EventDetailActivityTest
Tests for EventDetailActivity using Espresso and Espresso Intents to verify UI components and navigation intents.
EventDetailAdmin
An administrative activity for viewing detailed information about an event, including its poster, and managing the list of attendees.
EventListActivity
Displays a list of events fetched from Firebase Firestore.
EventListActivityTest
Espresso tests for EventListActivity, focusing on the user interaction flow for creating a new event.
EventListForAdminImage
An activity for administrators to view a list of all events.
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
MainActivity
MainActivity serves as the entry point for the application, guiding users to different app sections based on their role: Attendee, Organizer, or Admin.
MainActivityTest
Espresso UI tests for MainActivity, verifying navigation intents to different activities within the application.
MapActivity
A FragmentActivity that displays a map for a specific event, marking the locations of attendees who have enabled geolocation tracking.
MapActivityTest
Espresso tests for MapActivity to verify the visibility of control buttons and the functionality of the back button.
MyEventsActivity
Activity for displaying a list of events that an attendee is currently registered for and events they have signed up to attend in the future.
MyEventsActivityTest
Espresso tests for MyEventsActivity focus on verifying the visibility of UI components and the functionality of navigational controls.
NotificationHelper
A utility class that aids in the creation and management of notification channels and notifications within the application.
OrganizerAlerts
An activity that displays a list of alerts for organizers based on specific milestones reached within an event, such as a certain number of attendees registering.
ProQRCodeScannerActivity
An activity that allows users to decode QR codes from images.
QRCodeScannerActivity
An activity designed to scan QR codes from images for event check-ins.
SendNotificationActivity
An activity that allows users (typically organizers) to send notifications related to an event.
ShareQRCodeActivity
An activity that displays a QR code image and provides functionality to share it.
ShowProQRContent
An activity that displays the content decoded from a professional QR code.
UploadImage
An activity that allows users to upload images associated with events to Firebase Storage.
ViewEditEventDetailsActivity
An activity for viewing and editing the details of an event.
ViewEditEventDetailsActivityTest
Test class for ViewEditEventDetailsActivity using Espresso.
ViewEventAttendeeActivity
An activity that allows attendees to view event details and sign up for the event.
ViewEventAttendeeActivityTest
Performs UI tests on the ViewEventAttendeeActivity within the EventLink QR Pro application.
ViewEventPosterActivity
ViewEventPosterActivity displays the event poster for a specific event.
ViewProfileActivity
Activity for viewing an attendee's profile in detail, including their name, email, phone number, and profile image.
ViewProfileActivityTest
Tests the functionality within ViewProfileActivity of the EventLink QR Pro application.
